user_query: I'm organizing a charity event to raise funds for a local animal shelter. Can you help me find some creative fundraising ideas and games for the event? Also, find me the contact details of a local caterer who can provide food for the event. Finally, check if there are any public holidays or special events happening in the city on the day of our charity event.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of creative fundraising ideas and games suitable for a charity event.
Find contact details of local caterers who can provide food for the charity event.
Check for public holidays or special events occurring in the city on the date of the charity event.
